home.bestThingText: Our artists are handpicked and have multiple years of experience. We are carefully verifying their portfolios and credibility, ensuring the highest quality of tattoos possible. Quality is all that counts when it comes to tattoos.
home.offerStep1: 1. Browse professional artists in the Showroom.
home.offerStep2: 2. Explore their portfolios and choose your favorite artist.
home.offerStep3: 3. Select the size and style of your tattoo.
home.offerStep4: 4. Get an estimated time and price for your tattoo. Note: The minimum time for a tattoo is 3 hours.
home.offerStep5: 5. Schedule a date for your appointment.
home.offerStep6: 6. Pay the estimated price calculated by our system.
home.offerStep7: 7. Chat with the artist to finalize the details of your tattoo. The address will be provided once the artist accepts the appointment.
home.offerStep8: 8. Visit the artist's location on the day of the appointment.
home.offerStep9: 9. After the appointment, the artist will log the actual time taken to complete your tattoo.
home.offerStep10: 10. Receive a refund for every full hour less than the estimated time.
home.offerReview: Don't forget to leave a review for your artist! Your feedback helps them grow and makes our community even better.
home.refundPolicyText: You can cancel your appointment at any time; however, 20% of the payment will be retained as a down payment.

cut.question: How much of the cut does the artist get?
cut.answer: Artists receive 94% of the total payment for each appointment. The remaining amount covers platform services and transaction fees.

accept_appointments.question: Do I have to accept every appointment?
accept_appointments.answer: No, you are not obligated to accept every appointment. However, declining too many appointments may lead to your account being flagged for review, as customer satisfaction is a priority on our platform.

cancel_appointments.question: What happens if the customer cancels an appointment after I accepted it?
cancel_appointments.answer: If a customer cancels an appointment, you are entitled to 10% of the initial payment.

miss_appointments.question: What happens if I can't attend an appointment?
miss_appointments.answer: As an artist, you are fully responsible for managing your appointments. If you can't attend, promptly contact the customer through the chat feature to arrange a new date for the appointment.

set_holidays.question: How can I set holidays?
set_holidays.answer: You can easily set holidays using the Calendar feature available once you register.

showroom_listing.question: What do I have to do to be listed in the showroom?
showroom_listing.answer: To be listed in the showroom, you need to fulfill the following requirements:

list.address: Provide a valid address for your studio. This address will not be made public but is necessary for verification purposes.
list.portfolio: Upload a portfolio with at least 5 pictures. The portfolio will be vetted by our team to ensure quality and authenticity. You will get a response after about 24 hours.
list.login: Log in to your account regularly. If you do not log in for 12 consecutive days, your account will be temporarily disabled. Logging in again will immediately reactivate your account and reset the timer.

refund.question: Can I cancel my appointment?
refund.answer: Yes, you can cancel your appointment up until 24 hours before the appointment.

no-answer.question: What happens if the artist does not respond?
no-answer.answer: Artists are naturally motivated to respond promptly as it is part of their profession. Additionally, if an artist does not reply within two days, your appointment will automatically be marked as declined.

artist_qualification.question: How can I be sure the artist is qualified?
artist_qualification.answer: All our artists are carefully vetted, with verified portfolios and years of experience.

cancel.question: Where can I cancel my appointment?
cancel.answer: In the appointment section of your profile.

time_refund.question: What happens if the tattoo takes less time than estimated?
time_refund.answer: You'll receive a refund for every full hour less than the estimated time.

reschedule.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
reschedule.answer: Yes, you can reschedule your appointment anytime by contacting the artist directly through the chat feature.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you encounter any issues with your appointment, discover a bug, or have questions or suggestions regarding the features of our platform, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We typically respond within 2 business days.
